dt: {bc}an Old World finch ({it}Coccothraustes coccothraustes{/it} of the family Fringillidae) with a large heavy bill and short thick neck and the male marked with black, white, and brown

shortdef: an Old World finch (Coccothraustes coccothraustes of the family Fringillidae) with a large heavy bill and short thick neck and the male marked with black, white, and brown
